verses.verse: Now this is the <S%H4687>commandment,<s%> the <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and the <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H3925>teach<s%> <S%H6213>you,<s%> that you might do them in the <S%H776>land<s%> where you <S%H5674>go<s%> over to possess <S%H3423>it;<s%>

that you might <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> all his <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H1121>you,<s%> you, and your son, and your <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H1121>son,<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H2416>life;<s%> and that your <S%H3117>days<s%> may be <S%H748>prolonged.<s%>

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H3478>therefore,<s%> Israel, and <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3190>it;<s%> that it may be well with <S%H7235>you,<s%> and that you may increase <S%H3966>mightily,<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> has <S%H1696>promised<s%> to <S%H776>you,<s%> in a land <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey.<s%>
<S%H8085>Hear,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is our <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H259>one:<s%>
and you shall <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with all your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and with all your <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and with all your <S%H3966>might.<s%>
These <S%H1697>words,<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> shall be on your <S%H3824>heart;<s%>

and you shall teach them <S%H8150>diligently<s%> to your <S%H1121>children,<s%> and shall <S%H1696>talk<s%> of them when you <S%H3427>sit<s%> in your <S%H1004>house,<s%> and when you <S%H3212>walk<s%> by the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and when you lie <S%H7901>down,<s%> and when you rise <S%H6965>up.<s%>
You shall <S%H7194>bind<s%> them for a <S%H226>sign<s%> on your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and they shall be for <S%H2903>symbols<s%> between your <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
You shall <S%H3789>write<s%> them on the door <S%H4201>posts<s%> of your <S%H1004>house,<s%> and on your <S%H8179>gates.<s%>

It shall <S%H3068>be,<s%> when Yahweh your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H776>land<s%> which he <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H1419>you,<s%> great and <S%H2896>goodly<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> which you <S%H1129>didn't<s%> build,

and <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of all <S%H2898>good<s%> <S%H4390>things,<s%> which you didn't fill, and <S%H953>cisterns<s%> <S%H2672>dug<s%> <S%H2672>out,<s%> which you didn't dig, <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> and olive <S%H2132>trees,<s%> which you <S%H5193>didn't<s%> plant, and you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> and be <S%H7646>full;<s%>

then <S%H8104>beware<s%> lest you <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who brought you <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage.<s%>
You shall <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> and you shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H7650>him,<s%> and shall swear by his <S%H8034>name.<s%>
You shall not <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> of the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> who are around <S%H5439>you;<s%>

for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of you is a <S%H7067>jealous<s%> <S%H410>God;<s%> lest the <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> be <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H8045>you,<s%> and he destroy you from off the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%>
You shall not <S%H5254>tempt<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> as you <S%H5254>tempted<s%> him in <S%H4532>Massah.<s%>

You shall <S%H8104>diligently<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and his <S%H5713>testimonies,<s%> and his <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> which he has commanded <S%H6680>you.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H3477>right<s%> and <S%H2896>good<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> that it may be <S%H3190>well<s%> with <S%H935>you,<s%> and that you may go in and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%>
to thrust <S%H1920>out<s%> all your <S%H341>enemies<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>you,<s%> as Yahweh has <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

When your <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7592>asks<s%> you in time to <S%H4279>come,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "What do the <S%H5713>testimonies,<s%> the <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and the <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> has commanded you <S%H6680>mean?<s%>"

then you shall <S%H559>tell<s%> your <S%H1121>son,<s%> "We were <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H5650>bondservants<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> brought us <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand;<s%>

and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>showed<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H7451>awesome<s%> <S%H226>signs<s%> and <S%H4159>wonders<s%> on <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> on <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and on all his <S%H1004>house,<s%> before our <S%H5869>eyes;<s%>
and he brought us <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H935>there,<s%> that he might bring us in, to <S%H5414>give<s%> us the <S%H776>land<s%> which he <S%H7650>swore<s%> to our <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us to <S%H6213>do<s%> all these <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> for our <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H3117>always,<s%> that he might preserve us <S%H2421>alive,<s%> as at this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

It shall be <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> to <S%H8104>us,<s%> if we observe to <S%H6213>do<s%> all <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H4687>commandment<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> as he has commanded <S%H6680>us.<s%>"
